channel.title: How do i play moaprscape?
channel.description: may i ask 1 simple question?...HOW DO I PLAY MOPARSCAPE????!!!!???? will someone plz answer my question(s) with step by step process? :D :D :D :D

item.title: How do i play moaprscape?
item.dc:creator: @useful_miner useful miner
item.description:
@useful_miner wrote:

just to add one more thing to what stixx said if u do not have hamichi then u can only use no-ip servers so it will look something like usefulminer.no-ip.org or something like that but if u do have hamichi than u can use all servers it just might not let u in cause of server down or restarting or u may have to download a client =]

Read full topic

item.title: How do i play moaprscape?
item.dc:creator: @Stixx Stixx
item.description:
@Stixx wrote:

First, you need to know that you have Java updated.
Other than that, here’s a simple process:

  1. Go to Moparscape.com (if you need to, click yes in the box and click accept)

  2. Make up a username and password and enter it in the screen

3a) Go to the Server List, and pick an ip and the port. Enter it in the login screen. (Use file at the top and click port for the port)
3b) Go to the Forums at the top and click Server Advertisement. Click on a server being featured and enter the ip and port into the login screen.

Read full topic
